isFeatureLicensed

public boolean isFeatureLicensed(java.lang.String feature)
Check whether feature is covered by current license. For this, either the feature must be listed in the license or the latter must cover all features ("all")

Parameters:
feature - Feature to check
Returns:
true if feature is covered by licensed (or if all features are licensed)
